page.title: 17LIVING IN CHADDESLEY CORBETT
page.content: Why I like living in Chaddesley Corbett by Helen aged 9 years. I like living in Chaddesley Corbett because I have nothing to worry about like getting knocked over by a big lorry rushing past. I like living in Chaddesley because the air is fresh and not smelly from all the factories which a lot of people live by in the towns. All my friends live where I live because they like the pleasant countryside and the fresh air, so I have company. A lot of things happen in Chaddesley. Brownies and Guides are held in the village hall. Another reason I like living in Chaddesley is because I can play out in our street called Hemming Way. I like living in Chaddesley because of everythig.
